note:
I love myself.I will allow peace to fill my soul.
Today is a new day; I will see what adventure it holds.I choose to be proud of myself.I will do my absolute best in all things.I will speak kindly to others and to myself.I choose to be brave and tell others if I need their support.I have the power to control my reactions to the challenges I will face.I am becoming healthier each and every day.
